statements: SELECT * FROM user_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, user_id FROM user_engagement_data WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_data WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 5) ORDER BY engagement_score ASC;
SELECT email, engagement_date FROM user_engagement_data WHERE engagement_date >= '2022-09-01' AND engagement_date <= '2022-09-30' ORDER BY engagement_date;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_score FROM user_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_engagement_data WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_data WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_engagements, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM user_engagement_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM user_engagement_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_engagements > 3 ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email_address, join_date FROM users WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'click';
SELECT engagement_id, user_id, engagement_date FROM engagements ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM users WHERE join_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT user_id, join_date FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'click' AND engagement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT user_id, engagement_date, campaign_name FROM engagements ORDER BY engagement_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_email, signup_date FROM users;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE opened = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, email_subject, sent_date FROM emails WHERE clicked = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, email_subject, opened, clicked FROM emails ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_email, signup_date FROM users WHERE signup_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE sent_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT user_email, email_subject FROM users JOIN emails ON users.user_id = emails.user_id;
SELECT user_email, opened, engagement_type FROM users JOIN emails ON users.user_id = emails.user_id JOIN engagements ON emails.email_id = engagements.email_id;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_data;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_data WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT email_address FROM user_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM email_events WHERE user_id = 200 AND campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_data ORDER BY engagement_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT email_address, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_data WHERE engagement_score > 50
SELECT u.user_id, e.campaign_name FROM user_engagement_data u INNER JOIN email_campaigns e ON u.user_id = e.campaign_id
SELECT u.user_id, e.event_type, c.click_timestamp FROM user_engagement_data u JOIN email_events e ON u.user_id = e.user_id JOIN email_clicks c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE e.event_type = 'click'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5;
SELECT subject, body FROM email_content WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, user_id, sent_timestamp FROM email_logs ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT log_id, sent_timestamp, recipient_email FROM email_logs ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC;
SELECT E.subject, E.body, L.recipient_email, C.destination_url FROM email_content E JOIN email_logs L ON E.campaign_id = L.campaign_id JOIN click_events C ON L.log_id = C.log_id;
